Paragraph: A new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers containing two different electron - deficient units ( DPP and TPD ) were synthesized to produce polymers with complementary and broad light absorption from 400 to 900 nm.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers containing two different electron - deficient units ( DPP and TPD ) were synthesized to produce polymers with complementary and broad light absorption from 400 to 900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers |
| containing two different electron - deficient units |
| DPP and TPD |
| to produce polymers |
| with complementary and broad light absorption |
| from 400 to 900 nm |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers |
| with complementary and broad light absorption |
| from 400 to 900 nm |

Explanation:

* "containing two different electron - deficient units ( DPP and TPD )" refers to the composition of the terpolymers, which is not a material property.
* "to produce polymers" is a verb and does not refer to a specific property.
